titles.title: How Sweet the Name of Jesus Sounds

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: How sweet the name of Jesus sounds In a believer's ear! It soothes his sorrows, heals his wounds, And drives away his fear.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: It makes the wounded spirit whole And calms the troubled breast; 'Tis manna to the hungry soul And to the weary, rest.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Dear name! the rock on which I build, My shield and hiding place; My never-failing treasure, filled With boundless stores of grace!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Jesus, my Shepherd, Brother, Friend, My Prophet, Priest and King, My Lord, my Life, my Way, my End, Accept the praise I bring. Amen.
